q: How did Alexander the Great solve the puzzle of the Gordian knot? Hint: He probably was smarter than everyone else.
What sport sparked an entire war between El Salvador and Honduras after a single referee call?
Washington police officers have an entire hour and a half class learning what?
The average person does what 13 times a day?
It's technically illegal to do what to a cow in Texas?
Did you know that _______ kills most fruit flies?

discord.rule: Answer with the correct answer (or make the funniest responses)

q: May 21 2019 @discordapp says: im finally ready to admit this: I have never seen _____
Make a loading screen! The most liked wins
The creator of what massive franchise got the idea for it while eating pizza?
Tomb Raider's Lara Croft Breast size was actually created by accident. One of the developers wanted to increase her breast size but accidently put what?
A lot of people are wrong. WRONG! Mario actually does what when he hits a block (Spoiler: he doesn't hit it with his head).
What game was postponed and delayed several times because it had a hidden butt asset in it?
South Korea has a fascinating law for minors. It's illegal to do what if you are 16 and under?
What Guitar Hero version made more money than the entire band did in album sales?
Satoshi Tajiri, the creator of pokemon, got the idea for it from collecting what weird thing?

Everyone knows Robin Williams was a fan of video games so much he named his daughter Zelda after the princess. But did you know his son's name also comes from a video game? His name is Cody from what video game?

cards.rule: Create the funniest response. The most liked one wins.

q: I finally found _____ in my life. It's perfect.
What are my parents hiding from me?
Why can't I sleep at night?
